Name: Dragon Fire
Effect: [Brave][Quick]n/Deal 2 damage to an opposing Unit. Bloodlust: Deal 3 damage instead.

Name: Grim Axebearer
Effect: On Play -  Deal 2 damage to your Leader. Split 4 damage between up to 2 opposing Units.

Name: Feral Raze
Effect: [Brave][Quick]n/Deal 5 damage to an opposing Unit. Bloodlust: Draw 1.

Name: Dragon Rider
Effect: On Play - Deal 1 damage to an opposing Unit. Bloodlust: Deal 2 damage instead.

Name: Unchained Beast, Vajra
Effect: [Blitz]n/On Attack - If you have 10 or less Life, deal 2 damage to all opposing Units.

Name: Frenzied Bandit
Effect: On Play - Bloodlust: Draw 1.n/On Play - If you have 10 or less Life, Draw 1.

Name: Ironforged Dragoon
Effect: [Rush]n/On Play - If your Leader is not in Bloodlust, deal 1 damage to your Leader. Otherwise gain Blitz.

Name: Ignis Spirit
Effect: On Destroy - Deal 2 damage to the oppsing Leader.

Name: Demonic Mistress
Effect: On Play - Add 2 Rage Tokens to your hand and if you have 10 or less Life, recover 2 Mana.n/When your Leader takes damage by an allied effect, deal 2 damage to an opposing Unit or Leader.

Name: Howling Fangs
Effect: [Brave]n/Deal 3 damage to an opposing Unit. Bloodlust: Heal 2 to your Leader.
